name: QR0UP
description:
A qr0up of animals have been found in the desert, if they don't find water soon they will die! 

The heat is overwhelming which is slowing each animal down, the cacti will also end your run!

You see a water source in the distance, but, there is only water for one! 

Who will survive the longest to win the water race?

Q - to control the dove

R - to control the monkey

U - to control the pinguin

P - to control the tiger

0 - to restart the game
